content.detailedDescription:
Interesting report today


ufo report/comet / flying object fragments?


just happened now.
8/3-09 august 3rd 2009. hollywood./over los angles california , night
10:02 pm
exactly


sitting with mom in back patio. my viewpoint i could see the back wall and a frame of sky.
saw an intense fast moving streaking object/fragment of light ? another piece broke off of it
and that piece fell downward and went out of sight instantly. the main piece continued and went out of sight instantly
happened within a fraction of one second.
comet, or craft/ cloaking/ disintagration/ commercial satellite breaking up /?

i was startled and scared. jumped up to look at it, said to mom instanty "wow!!"

jumped up and was amazed. comet or something. i instantly thought ufo cause i was studying them.
looks like a comet.
big one! fast! powerful !

dont know what else to say. it was silent. seemed very large. not like a comet from any observations i had before, which were tiny and
pitiful, and not as fast.

end of report
content.summary: Comet / flying object fragments

content.detailedDescription: I went out skywatching taking my night-vision binoculars and digital camera which i've done only 6-7 times lately. i sat watching maybe 30 minutes after seeing a couple falling stars and a plane when i spotted a brighter object out of the nw headed somewhat towards me going se. i first looked at it through my night-vision binoculars cause it wasn't moving irregularly but i didn't notice strobe lights. i then got video recorder ready and and started filming. i could not see anything in the lcd lens so i just pointed in the direction it was and hoped i was catching this just in case. the object was almost past me when it did some pulsating or something and disappeared, but i want to call it "flickering out." i did manage to catch some video but the quality isn't great cause it's shaky and i played the video to my tv and recorded that with my iphone so it's a video of a video. i did upload the video to youtube.Com from my phone and if you search (possible ufo near victoria,tx) or search my username (joshtx1) you should find it. i do have the original video that i need to upload to the computer but i have to upgrade nerophoto if that's what it's called. i first tried to report my sighting through my iphone and got all the way through it all and it wouldn't let me do it so.. tonight (8-4-09)i was searching through texas sighting because i found a link about june being hot ufo month for texas and i went there to find a report from victoria, tx on the same night i saw something (6-26-09). my video recorder reads 10:09pm, their report is like 11:43pm. i thought that was really strange so it pushed me to come on and give my report.
content.summary: Saw bright object moving from nw to se near victoria, tx

content.detailedDescription:
My sister ,my niece and my self were taking pictures of the moon.We were staying in a cabin 12 miles east of forks washington.I saw flashing red lights coming from below the moon in a westerly direction.I said look it's a ufo .(i am always joking about it because you never see one). they looked and it did look weird.At first we thought it was a plane  then i thought it was two helicopters flying in formation ,but there was no sound .Then the whitish/blueish looking lights seemed to flash one after the other around the craft.The lights blinked so fast around that is just seemed to faintly show off it's triangular shape. it headed west coming from the east south east .We watched it glide through the air it banked and seemed to turn on its side then it came back towards the east it seemed to hover for a bit then it disappeared into the clouds when we saw it again it was heading west. it seemed closer .It then ascended up into the clouds and disappeared.
 i was so excited om my god it was pretty much the coolest thing i have ever seen in the sky.I was so stoked.My niece seemed excited and so did my sister.
 we were trying to theorize what it could be and one of our theories is that was military.Of course i want to believe it was extraterrestrial .
  i did take pictures and a video but you can't really see any thing.
i heard a plane sound, then bit after that we saw one in the distance.It was a large plane booming sound not directly over head .It was hard to tell if the sound came from the craft because there was a lot of silence.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashing lights red blue white .

content.detailedDescription: While outside on stated date, we were having quite a rain storm with dark, black low cloud cover and no stars were showing and no moon. i looked up to the west of my location and in a black cloud there was this brilliant white light staying stationery with what appeared several small white lights dropping from beneath the light. the light and/or object did not move or change locations...Just sat there.  i watched this for 17 minutes or so and finally the light just went away/disappeared. i have never seen anything like this before especially when it is storming. i felt very unnerved at the time and went inside. the sky appeared normal 2 hours after this incident with no light...Just rain clouds.
content.summary: Brilliant white light in black rain cloud with small white lights  coming from beneath the light

content.detailedDescription:
Last night my son and i saw a "ufo" over anacortes, washington, heading southeast. 
it made two noises, one of which was a high pitch whine, sort of like as a plane might be diving or crashing, the other sound was more of a rumble similar to a very large blimp. my sons, were awoke by the rumble.
it had three lights which were airplane like,in a light red tone forming a perfect equilateral triangle. there were also two white alternating lights that appeared to be in a center-front position on the bottom of the craft.

it appeared to be flying very slow and at low altitude as it flew over toward the refinery. i saw what looked like a wide flattish wing bending up at the outside edge, in a grey shade, as the refinery's flame reflected off the item, (the flares give off an eerie glow as they burn, so who knows the actual color).

i saw the ufo from a different angle than my son, he was on the 2nd floor, i was on ground level. getting water, when i heard the rumble and then the whining . it sounded like a plane going to crash  and i went to look out back, it had already passed over, so i ran back inside and watched the triangle of lights continue towards the refinery (the color seems not as red to me, but i was looking through low-e glass).
our guess is some sort of military item, but we can't identify it. my son, (who is very into military aircraft) thinks the closest likeness would be a c-130j super hercules, as perhaps a cargo plane for the blue angels, but he really didn't think that was it. he said it was moving too slowly for anything he could think of, and if it was in fact moving at a normal cruising speed, then that would make the craft a massive size, being that it would be at high altitude. when he went out in front of the house to look again, the craft started to fade off in the distance and for the last portion of visibility the only lights to be seen were the white flashing ones. we watched until it flew out of range and/or was no longer in sight we stayed up for quite awhile watching the sky trying to find it again, but to no avail.

we live very close to a naval air station, and also have the blue angles in seattle for seafair. we get all the navy jets, planes and helicopters over our house on a regular basis, but we had never seen or heard anything like this. we also have helicopters landing and taking off within a mile of us as well
content.summary: Slow moving, large, loud & whinning, the main lights had a triangular formation

content.detailedDescription:
On evening of 4 august 2009 from 21:53 till 21:55 me and my girlfriend were walking in illasi (verona italy) after a coffe.
during the walk we spot on the sky an orange light, at nw of illasi, fliing to ne of illasi. after few seconds appears to us was going too slow to be an airplane. even also, after few seconds we were looking it, it start to seems fixed in the sky, and moving on his left after 10 seconds about. understood that was something really strange, we start to record it with our mobile phones, film is'nt good (nokia n73 mobile phone) and filmed in hand . in about 2 minutes that supposed ufo went left, right and back in really fast movement.
also,in same time , was flying a common airplane from est to west (illasi point reference) and while that airplane took about 1 min and half to do all the sky from east to west, that object was moving fast in little space and in direction so different that we think impossible to be done by human veicle.
at begin we thought of an airplane, but after we see the movement and the velocity in short space we discard it; also we discarded copter idea, couse was so hight altitude for a copter; least as at naked eye seems dark orange light, instead on the movie seems 2-3 light of red, blue and green. stimate altitude over 6000 meters.
our feeling at begins was curiosity, when we understood wasn't an airplane a bit of scare mixed of much more interesting and we startto film it; after more scared, couse that object disappeared in 2 min about, istantanely.
sky was really random and spaced small clouds, but in that part was clear ( the common airplane we keep in sight till too far)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Light orange color, looklike an airplane but too slow, and too high altitude as copter.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of tuesday, 7/28/09 i, along with several other witnesses (including hampton, nh police officer matt dion), observed an unusual light in the eastern sky while standing on hampton beach.  it was an erratic and jerky-moving non-blinking white light in the clear night sky, brighter than venus.  i, myself, observed it from approximately 9 p.M. to 11 p.M.  it defied the flight characteristics of any conventional aircraft in that it sometimes moved in very quick start and stops, quick up and downs, sudden diagonals, and rapid left to rights.  it was aproximately 30-40 degrees above the horizon facing almost exactly due east.  then last night, monday, 8/3/09, i saw the same type of light from dover, nh.  using my cell phone i called foster's daily democrat, the local newspaper, and a reporter came out who also observed the unusual object.  i then drove back to my apartment in rochester, nh and continued to watch it do its unusual movements until approximately 4 a.M. on 8/4/09 when i was too tired to continue watching.  before i retire, however, i used my compass to determine it was in the south-southwest area of the night sky (205-220 degrees on compass) and i also estimate it was between 30 and 45 degrees above the horizon (with zenith being 90 degrees, for example).
content.summary: Erractic and jerky-moving non-blinking white light in clear night sky, brighter than venus, observed for several hours while stars nearby appeared normal.

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dogs and was on the phone with my best friend when something shiny caught my eye.  i looked up and there was a disc shaped object in the sky floating around.  i asked her if she could see it from lakewood co where she was also walking her dogs, about 30 minutes away from me.  she could not because she was underneath tree cover.  i watched it move around and then it went almost straight up and was gone.  i did not see it again. the sun was just setting and the reflection made it very easy to spot. the next evening my daughter and i were walking and saw something very similiar in the night sky 3 times.  we felt excited and honored to have seen these.
content.summary: I saw it shimmering in the sunset

content.detailedDescription:
July 28, at approx. 8:15 p.M.  there was a storm approaching from the southwest and the cloud tops were magnificent.  i could see rain and lightning to my wsw.  i decided to grab my little sony digital camera and take a few shots and some video, hoping to catch the lightning.
what showed up in 2 of the stills is a mystery.  i was watching the sky and not the camera view screen.  i never saw anything but clouds.  i did not hear or see any jets, airplanes, or helicopters.
while i took the shots, some pics blurred.  i had set the camera on auto and the camera would refuse to focus, then it just shut off.  i checked and still had half a charge on the battery but every other time i'd turn the camera on and point at the sky, it would switch off.

my spouse called me 15 minutes later (i looked at my clock), from the west end of town, saying that it was pouring down rain, with pea to marble sized hail.  i could hear the clatter in the background as we spoke.  moments later the rain reached our home, so my picture taking came to an end.
in the 2 photos i have attached, i cropped and enlarged the objects.  i have the untouched originals if you need them.

then on august 2, 2009 at 0200 hrs., i stepped outside with my little dogs.  i was facing south admiring the bright moon, when a flash of bright red light caught my eye.  i turned to my left and there was another red flash of light at 50 degrees above the ese horizon.
at first i expected it to be a jet but 3-5 more seconds passed before another flash occurred.  it was in the exact same spot as the first 2 flashes.  i motioned for my spouse to come see but as we watched, no more flashes occurred.  we searched the sky for another 15 minutes but no sign of the flashes and no jet.
the only way that i can describe the incident, would be that the flashes were more like a burst or pulse, which seemed to radiate out from a fixed position in the sky.  it was a mostly clear night, with abundant stars visible.
i could not determine size or distance, as i had nothing to compare it to, other than to say that the burst of light covered at least 5 degrees in all directions from a central point, reminding me of an exaggerated "lighthouse effect".

i agree to the release of my contact information to third parties (only) as part of the investigation into my report of a ufo sighting.
content.summary: 2 reports- 1 for july 28, 2009: objects appear in photos of storm clouds; 2nd report: aug. 2, 2009:  red burst of light in night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I'm looking at it right [cms/tg/pd] now someone post a [cms/tg/pd] phone number or something! its been there for over an hour!  i walked out the backdoor to smoke a cig, and noticed odd pulsating lights towards dunlap, shape was unclear so i got my telescope and can see it perfectly!  it dont look worth a [cms/tg/pd] on my crappy [cms/tg/pd] digital cam but through the scope i can see it in definition.  3 white lights at the corners, and a pulsating green light on bottom that runs the length of craft!  i want to see it closer and get its attention! i havent lost sight of it im still looking at it!
content.summary: Well lit triangle

content.detailedDescription: I picked up a friend from their house in sd, and we were on our way downtown. we got on the freeway heading north and about one or two minutes later the sighting occured; i believe it was between 10 and 1030 if i'm not mistaken. a light had caught my eye and i couldn't help but notice it as it was right above the horizon directly in front of us. first there was one orb, then two more, and the one on the right side of the triangle started moving around. it was moving in a circular fashion around the central orb, although i'm not positive about the orb on the left side, as i had to pay attention to the road. this thing was massive. it took up a chunk of the horizon, and there is no way that someone could have missed this. i can't really estimate the size, but it looked like it could have been 1000 ft. on each side. (again, just an educated guess). since this was not my first ufo sighting, i didn't freak out or lose my composure, but my friend was only conviced that they were helicopters, because he doesn't buy the whole 'little green men' thing. at first i thought that this was the most amazing thing i have ever seen. i still feel that way. the entire way home i kept thinking about it and how magnificent it was to see something so spectacular and rare, and i consider myself lucky i got to see this. eventually the orbs just kind of 'turned off' as if a candle was blown out in a room. i can't really think of a way to describe it- it was just too perfect the way they disappeared. usually i have my video camera on me, but tonight i didn't think i would see this so sorry no pics or vids.
content.summary: Triangle composed of individual orbs rotating around a central orb (3 orbs total)

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 9:30pm i was heading home north on state line avenue after a long day of work. i was stopped at a traffic light when i noticed in my periphereal vision a bright object in the eastern sky. the object was bright at first, like a star, but the lights faded and i could see what appeared to be a dark, triangular object that appeared to hover or rotate in place. after about 2 or 3 seconds it shot off into the distance - faster than a shooting star. this was not a jet, airplane, or satellite. i was completely sober (didn't even have any coffee) and had a brand new pair of contact lens in.

were there any other sightings around this time?
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription: Roughly a year ago, 3 friends and i drove to rose valley for a hike near middle lions campground at about 3 am. rose valley is located in southern california north on highway 33 near ojai and ventura. we pulled off the road and parked in front of a closed dirt road. the road ahead was blocked by a barricade but  we continued anyway. at the top of the road we encountered a red glowing orb in the background approximately 1 foot in diameter and about 15 feet off the road. one of my friends walked toward it to see what it was when it floated closer to us revealing that the orb was disembodied and floating in mid air. we freaked out and started running back toward the car, and realized that it was following us about 10 feet behind. once we got around the bend, it stopped following us and we returned to our car and left. we would like to find out more about this strange event if anyone can help or have received any other reports like this in the ventura county please let us know. thanks.
content.shape: Circle,  Fireball,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Chased by a red orb in rose valley, ca

content.detailedDescription:
I lived in a remote area of traprock property that bordered the central hudson power plant property and the hudson river, it was october 29, 1977, i had been told by my boyfriend never to turn the lights out, outside or inside at night. i was home with my son who was 2 years old. it was a ranch house, and it had heating vents in the ceilings. i heard a loud rumbling noise, that i had heard before, it was so strong that it shook the vents out of place in the ceiling. i was tired of climbing up and fixing them. it was 7pm, my son was asleep and i turned on the tv and it was all scrammbled. i heard the rumbling and humming noises and turned all the light out. i went to the front bedroom window, opened it, and was kneeling down looking out towards the river area. i heard what sounded like a horse whinning in the distance, and could see beyond the woods flashing lights close to the ground in a circle pattern.I saw closer to the house my boyfriends dog and cat shaking from fright under a bush, near the house. i looked up in the sky and saw a aerial display of lights, one large main flying light surrounded by smaller ones. it looked like the smaller flying things were protecting the larger one. the sky was clear, i thought i could just watch all their darting and moving around and who would care.I even pinched myself to make sure i was seeing what i was seeing. then a glowing object left the formation and started coming closer to my location, i watched it fly towards the house closer and closer, i was experiencing great fear, but was frozen and could not move, the  dome,a red glowing thing hovered outside my window area, to the height of the roof eave, i was staring into a red fireball hovering, could not move or speak, only think words. i told them that i would not watch any more. a flash of red light and i was gone. when i found  myself back, maybe 30 minutes or longer, i had a stiff neck, and i was bleeding internally.My boyfriend came home and told me the truth, and he told me that he had seen them and was doing things for them by the hudson river. they would tell him to collect things and he would bring the things to them. he described them as 4ft high, slanty red eyes, they were sub human and knew everything he was thinking and doing. they gave him large vegetables to eat. the next morning the local paper had many stories about people calling the police, and reporting sightings, their animals were going crazy. central hudson electric would not allow any investigators on that property. i thought it was over for me but it was not, too make it short, i had to go to a doctor i did not know, and he told me that i had a perforated uterus. during the exam, which was a few months later he told me that i was not pregnant. i was being told that when something happened i was suppose to wrap it up and put it outside in a certain spot. i had no idea why they had told me that until one more month had passed and one day out of nowhere something came out and i did what they told me to do, wrap it up and put it in a certain place. for the next five months i ignored them, and then we were told that all the houses were going to be demolished, and my boyfriend was given the job to demolish them. i remember that they told me that 3 of them would come to ask me for assistance at some time later.I know what they did, an experiment to find out if they could impregnate humans. they had me reading all these different books for information. i know that they get you with fear, and mind control. they are very intelligent.

it was october of 1987, monroe ny county of orange, i was listening to the tv about a black man that said he was abducted, he was illerate prior to the abduction, and when i heard him describe the aliens i went to watch and hear what he was saying, he said there time is not our time, it is 10 years difference. my boyfriend was visiting and woke me one night afraid and said that he heard flying noises and looked and saw ufos. i told him okay, don't worry. when he had left for a business trip and i was alone with the kids, one night i was woken up at 3am, october of 1987 and i looked out my two story front window. below on the ground in full light were 3 of the same aliens, 4ft tall, gray bodies, no segmentation of their bodies, and slanty red eyes. they were calling my name and asking me to come out. i told them no, and went to bed. there was no fear any longer. 

i never looked for them any longer, and figured that they were gone forever. in 2003 while shopping a strange lady approached me and invited me a stranger, to have tea at her house. she said it was important and i had to come. i will not name her, but i went because i was curious. she told me that she was a physhic and read for the queen of england, she needed to warn me about the ufo people. i had never said a word to her about what happened to me in 1977 and in 1987. she told me that they are evil, and they are not done with me yet. i told her that i was done with them and she they are not done with me. that was in 2003. i knew that day in the store, when this strange lady was following me around for hours, was odd, but she was really a very gifted person. that happened in naples, florida. i lived in port charlotte, florida from 2003 to 2009, and i ignored the flying  objects i would see. i saw that news article about rowley in north port, fl.I knew it was all made up. any person, that is taken against their free will, in fear, with their power of mind control, they have no mouths, who is awake the entire time, not asleep or dreaming, or taking medication, or drinking, does not consider the long term effects to be funny. i read later on about the guy in middletown ny, he was telling the truth, the halls, they were telling the truth. it is understandable, unless you experience it for your self, that you can not believe that it exists. i think the ufo crafts need the electric from the water and power plants, they experiment, they try to breed their people with humans, and perhaps that is what they want to show me. i do know, if they want to make contact they can, but if you show no fear it lessens their power. i can tell if a person has really been affected by the trama that such an encounter causes. i lived it. i have seen ufos on alligator alley coming from fort lauderdale to naples, the craft flew directly over our car, you could see the bottom and all the lights, my husband saw it, my kids saw it. my kids believed what they saw as unusual, my husband did not. my sons father, who has passed away, told me back in newburgh ny, that the alliens think it is funny how stupid we are, and how the cause and cure for cancer is so simple yet we can not figure it out. 

you can check the records for the dates i have written, a lady in maybrook ny on the morning of october 30, 1977 saw a ufo, was so scared she had heart pains and the middletown record had a story about it. why did traprock want all those houses in that private area demolished without much notice?  i do believe that they are not good but they are evil, like the woman told me, and to stay far away from them.........
content.shape: Cylinder,  Fireball,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Triangle
content.summary: Private property that bordered the central hudson power plant, traprock

content.detailedDescription: This time, i was alone.  i was expecting nothing.  after about an hour or so of standing outside (alone) my wife decided to head to the store.  a few minutes after she left one of them showed up a few thousand feet up or so and moved along the sky and disappeared.  20 more minutes go by and as i looked up i saw one high and to my south (light up and then disappear) really quick, but headed back in my direction.  i got my camera ready, but what was about to happen; in all honesty i was not ready for.  within just a few seconds, very close the craft lit up out of nowhere.  i started filming, which is difficult when they fly directly above you,  as it went out of view over the tops of the trees in my yard, i ran out to finish filming it as it left the area.  i was a little shook up this time, mostly because they surprised me.  after returning from a short break, several minutes went by and to my west, one lit up out of nowhere for a split second and out of of the corner of my eye to the south i filmed another craft, very beautiful and brightly lit slowly traveling just above the tree lines.  after these two, i stopped for the night,  i had enough for one evening.  :)
content.summary: Two showed up close as others stayed star-like in distance

content.detailedDescription:
While returning from work on monday morning, i stopped outside the back door of the house before going in, to glance at the sky. the sky was mostly cloudy the night before but clear at that time. after a few seconds, i noticed a star like object moving from west to east. the object was very high in the sky and could easily be confused with a star. the light emanating from the object was solid white, and did not blink. the movement was at a constant speed and there was no sound. the object moved in a straight line as if it had a fixed path.

when the object was almost away from my sight, i noticed another object with the same characteristics moving in the opposite direction (east to west). as the object moved about halfway of my scope of view, another object appeared moving from north to south. the objects were observed for about five minutes until they were no longer visible.
content.summary: Three start like objects moving in different directions

content.detailedDescription:
i was in my den looking at the beautiful sun set in the clear sky. i look at my wife to tell her what a wonderful night it was. thats when i decide to go grab my camera and race outside to snap a few pictures to keep as memories. when i was taking a picture of the sunset my eye shifts to the moon in the south-east of the sky. i decide to take a picture. once the picture is captured in my camera i view the picture and i notice that in the upper conner i notice that i caught a light besides the moon. i tell my wife i found a ufo. right after i take another picture to make sure that there is nothing wrong with my camera and to reassure my self. i rush to my office and download the pictures into my computer. there it was i noticed that the ufo had distanced between the two shots it had traveled in the speed of light. 

photo's are available. they are very clear and feel free to zoom in!
content.summary: White colored ufo disc like shape that wasn't visual to the human eye but available to a camera.

content.detailedDescription:
We (myself and two friends were doing some night fishing on lake of the ozarks on the grand glaize arm. as we are boating along at aprox. 30 mph, i noticed a red soda can shaped deep red light slowly moving across the sky at a low altitude. we didnt think much about as i pointed it out. as we start to make a turn around an "arm" of the lake we see another rising in the sky and starting to move off in the same direction as the one we saw on the other side of the arm. not but a few seconds later we saw one rise from over the trees to our right (like a ballon being released)and steadily move more away from us and to the right where the first couple seemed to just move straight to our right. at this point we were confused because they seem to be rising from the trees from pretty close by. as i looked over to see if we could see the first few.....We noticed that the lights were disapering after about 15 to 20 seconds and seemed to be covering a bit of ground quickly. one was becoming very dim and diasapering directly to our right and a couple others moved to the right but almost directly away from us. they were clearly not planes nor helicopters, as they made no sound. we estimated to see about 7 or 8 of these objects in total. my only guess would be some extreemly bright, big, deep red ballons but seemed to be moving far to quickly for the wind to be blowing them not to mention there was almost no breeze and what breeze there was was hitting us directly in the face....Not out to our right and away from us. i took some digital pictures with a sony cybershot 8.1mp camera. i must have about 10 pics and one video. it dosnt show up on the video but does clearly on about 6 pictures. i zoomed in using corel snapfire plus and you can see different colors light around the outside of the object. i hope someone can tell us what it was.....  

the pictures are the red light in the center of the picture and the lights to the lower right are of a house right on the lake with a lot of lights on....They looked to be having a party. we were wondering if they could see these objects as they went right over the house.
content.summary: Saw multiple red lights rising steadily one after another, up and off to our left. aproximately 7 differnt lights all the same.

content.detailedDescription: We (myself and two friends were doing some night fishing on lake of the ozarks on the grand glaize arm. as we are boating along at aprox. 30 mph, i noticed a red soda can shaped deep red light slowly moving across the sky at a low altitude. we didnt think much about as i pointed it out. as we start to make a turn around an "arm" of the lake we see another rising in the sky and starting to move off in the same direction as the one we saw on the other side of the arm. not but a few seconds later we saw one rise from over the trees to our right (like a ballon being released)and steadily move more away from us and to the right where the first couple seemed to just move straight to our right. at this point we were confused because they seem to be rising from the trees from pretty close by. as i looked over to see if we could see the first few.....We noticed that the lights were disapering after about 15 to 20 seconds and seemed to be covering a bit of ground quickly. one was becoming very dim and diasapering directly to our right and a couple others moved to the right but almost directly away from us. they were clearly not planes nor helicopters, as they made no sound. we estimated to see about 7 or 8 of these objects in total. my only guess would be some extreemly bright, big, deep red ballons but seemed to be moving far to quickly for the wind to be blowing them not to mention there was almost no breeze and what breeze there was was hitting us directly in the face....Not out to our right and away from us. i took some digital pictures with a sony cybershot 8.1mp camera. i must have about 10 pics and one video. it dosnt show up on the video but does clearly on about 6 pictures. i zoomed in using corel snapfire plus and you can see different colors light around the outside of the object. i hope someone can tell us what it was.....
content.summary: Saw multiple red lights rising steadily one after another, up and off to our left. aproximately 7 differnt lights all the same.

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this for the person who saw the object (but declined to either report it, or be identified as having seen it) exactly as the witness related it to me; therefore, this report is hearsay, and i am only relating this in case others will read and confirm. if mufon would like to confidentially interview this witness and he is willing, i can pass on your contact info and have him call you on my phone.

friday, july 3, 2009, witness was driving in car with daughter. sky was overcast and it was dusk (time 2100 aprox). in vicinity of deputy, in, driver did not at first see object, and daughter says, "daddy, what is that?"  he looks and sees a round, glowing object ...And also noticed that others were looking up at it.  it was stationary most of the time, but after a short period of time - exact time not noted, but it was seconds, not minutes - it ascended into the overcast and was not seen again. there was a short conversation as to whether or not they had seen a ufo.

witness was convinced that what he and his daughter had seen was not a conventional aircraft and was an anamalous aerial object, because of the unuausl flight characteristics, lack of sound, and luminous appearance. witness unable to describe aprox height or size of object. as noted, there were other witnesses to this event, but the number of people was not given.

it should also be noted that there was not any convective activity ()with lightning in the vicinity at the time. deputy is near a former military proving ground (jefferson), now used for urban warfare training.
content.summary: Round lighted object, not aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my father west on fletcher ave. near the university of south florida and i glimpsed a very shiny metallic disc with a slightly conical shape above the tree line by the time i realized i had seen anything it was gone. i didn't even think that i had seen anything unusual until i looked around for what it could be and nothing fit the profile. there is a water tower in the area but it is not metallic like the object i saw.
content.summary: Shiny metallic disc floating above the tree line near usf

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from church to my house with my radio off and i was alone in the street no cars were around that area...... i looked up... and this yellow lights cough my attention.. i was like wat the hell is that.. yellow light and the object was round.. lights were going on and off in a circle..I parked and recorded it..  i called my friend jake he lives in huntington park... he went out side his house and saw it as well..Then his siblings called more  friends from church that live in compton.They also saw the ufo... .I later on that night i got home showed it my family... my phone was in vibration mode... i played it with volume and i am able to hear sum weird voices...    so i am willing to give this video up to any now that might be willing to buy it for research.. now if u guys are willing to get it give me a call.. i got a call a week ago but i wasnt home after that no one has called me back.. so i guys are willing to get it call me up we can arrange on a fee that we both would agree on... its not fake i have the original video capture from my phone..  just call me up i would be glad to give it up to any one that wants to buy it for research..
content.summary: The ufo was flying by los angeles convention center

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend in side my house when we decided to go smoke at about 12:30 or 1:00am when we saw a bright ball of light appear and disapear my heart started racing cause i knew it wasn't an airplane it moved to fast for it to be an airplane of some sort. when it apeared again it had turned from ball of light to triangle with lots of flashing lights. i told my friend go grab a camera. he told me to keep an eye on it. he began to film about a minute when it just took off out of sight. we were both surprised and excited about it. we rewined the film and saw it again. we still were surprised at what we saw. my friend had just got out the army, he said he never saw no militery craft like that. so we believe it couldn't be militery. (we have video of this but couldn't post it)
content.summary: Was outside when a ball of light showed up then turned triangle.

content.detailedDescription: It was approx. 12:15am and i went out to walk my dog. i looked up at the stars as i usual do at night and noticed a 2 lights coming towards me. this didn't seem to unusual to me considering i live in staten island, ny and we have 3 big airports in the vicinity.(jfk, lag, nwk) as the craft got closer it seemed odd to me so i asked my wife to look out the window at the object. within seconds she ran outside to get a better look. the unknown object was moving rather quickly. like i said airplanes fly over my house all day and night and they are usually on approach so they are not traveling full speed, but this object was moving very fast thru the sky. at this point it was close to overhead and we noticed it it was actually 3 lights in a triangular shape with a blinking red light dead in the center. i could not see the outline of the object, but it was blocking out the stars above it. as far as the lights seemed, the object was somewhat larger than a plane, but this was because it was at a lower altitude than the planes that usually fly over. what was even more amazing was the fact there was no noise, even though it was low in the sky. as it passed over of us we just couldn't take our eyes off of it. then we noticed a 4th light in between the 2 lights in the back of the craft. it seemed very odd that a 4th light would just illuminate suddenly. my wife and i were puzzled as to what it could be and before we knew it it was gone and out of sight. we decided to watch 2 planes that flew over minutes afterward and not too surprising was the fact that there was no comparison. when the planes flew over you could not only hear them loud and clear, but we could actually see the outline of the airplane. and the airplanes had one bright light and 2 blinking lights on either side of the main light. they looked nothing like the object we saw. now i won't pretend to be an expert on airplanes, but i have seen planes flying overhead everyday my entire life leaving in the nyc area and this was different. if anyone can supply me with some opinions as to what it maybe or  know of any sightings of similar craft around this area or date please let me know. i do know it wasn't a balloon, kite, satellite, space debris, or a helicopter, so please do not give me some lame excuse. tank you and i appreciate it.
content.summary: Unknown triangular object flies over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
(i had originally posted this report elsewhere about a week after it happened.)

this sighting lasted probably less than a minute.  i walked outside on my patio early that morning and looked up at the stars in the clear predawn sky.  i turned my head to the left and at that moment i noticed a bright light, maybe twice the size of venus.  the light appeared to be moving right at me even though very high up and it seems that as it noticed that i was looking straight at it, it then began to move backwards and then to go up even higher until it finally became non-visible.
  
so many thoughts went through my head at a rapid speed regarding what i might have thought this thing to be as i was looking at it.  i knew that it couldn���t be a satellite because it was just too bright and because of the way that it had just suddenly reversed itself and went straight up till it disappeared.  i have never seen satellites behave that way.  there were no running lights, no port or starboard lights on what i was seeing.  it was just a big ball of light.  the light also seemed to be sort of flickering at the center.  i say flicker, but i mean that it was more like if one were to take some crinkled tin foil and move it around in the hand just slightly so that it throws light reflections around.  

there actually was a car going by at exactly the same time that i saw this light in the sky.  i remember thinking as it happened that the lights on this car could be reflecting on something and causing this light in the sky, but quickly dismissed that idea since the car was down below me and on the street behind my apartment, which is on the second level, and the bright light i saw in the sky seemed too high up to be a reflection from anything on the ground.      
  
this sighting affected me in a very unfamiliar way.  i feel that my reaction to it was very instinctual and quick. i became very afraid as i stood there watching it move up into non-visibility.  i think the hair on my arms stood up and that it made my skin crawl.  the one thing that really got to me was that i felt this light was being stealthy and creeping in on me and when i turned my head to look at it, it just backed away, as though it knew that i was looking at it and sort of catching it in the act.  i felt like a frightened animal, or a cornered animal.  i then just gave up on watching it disappear and bolted back inside.  upon entering i looked at the clock and it was 4 a.M.  my clock on the wall is two minutes fast, so the actual time was more like 3:58 a.M.
content.summary: Bright light high up, approaching me, backs away when i see it, moves higher and disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on indiana 47, toward westfield, indiana, last night.  spotted a ufo at 10:30.

i'm not a professional.  this is my first sighting.  it was left of my visual of the moon, in the center of my line of vision, large, brightly lit, white light, dead still, and very high up.  i could see planes occasionally fly over, and under it.  they seemed to be observing it.  i hope that means you have reports from skilled aviators this morning..  it looked to be about one fourth the width of the moon.  i imagine it to be a round craft, but what i saw was a straight line, brightly lit, about one fourth of the width of the moon, left of the moon in my line of vision.  the light was very bright and steady.  i came home, and watched it until almost midnight, dead still in the sky.  it was an amazing sight!

 

i understand you try to track all activity, so i wanted to report to you.  thank you for your work.  i know we all need to know and understand the true nature of your universe better.  i've learned a lot of valuable information from mufon.  hope this is helpful to your work.  please share this report with any other organization that it would be useful to.
content.summary: Bright white light, large, high, and still for at least an hour.

content.detailedDescription: Yeah, i know it sounds ridiculous, but around 9:55 pm, my cousin and i were driving eastbound on rt. 224 and witnessed 3 very-bright orange glowing object in the sky, flying in a "v" formation, heading west south west. the objects then seemed to dissipate into the night air. we had no idea what they could've been. 5 minutes later, another barrage of 3 appeared and were heading in the same direction and also disappeared in the same spot as the first three. we pulled over and grabbed something to eat at steak-n-shake. i went outside just to take another look and eventually the whole crew and all the customers came outside and were staring at 5 of these things, flying in the same direction and disappearing at the same point as the ones before them. in all, we saw 16 of these aircrafts.  i tried to take pictures, but though the objects appeared in my viewfinder, they did not show up in the photographs.
content.summary: 16 bright glowing orange/red objects flying 3 at a time in a  "v" formation that disappeared into sky

content.detailedDescription: Either i saw 6 satellites in 10 minutes or something strange was going on. they were all going in different directions 5 of the 6 looked like stars but one of them looked alot lower and had a brighter light source to it. i was out in my frontyard just looking up at the sky and didn't realize my father was out in the driveway and he also saw these. i came in then he came in (not realizing he was outside) i said to him i saw a bunch of satellites up in the sky at once and he replied back with is that what those were? i had no idea he was also outside looking at the same things.
content.summary: Strange

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in the hot tub, watching the sky.  my husband suddenly said, "what the hell is that?". i looked at him and he was looking directly over the roof toward the north. there appeared a bright circular object passing in a southerly direction, directly overhead.  we both looked up and followed its path with our eyes from the top of the roof across sky, until we lost sight through the trees.  i was facing south and watched it pass overhead as it headed south. in a matter of a few seconds, approximately 3, it was gone, so it had to be incredibly fast.  it was many times larger than the stars in the sky.  there was no tail, just a bright object, no sound.
content.summary: Bright circular object shot overhead - horizon to horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my back yard, after doing the cseti protocols (earlier in the day )  from dr. steven greer, when i noticed a satelite moving accross a star, just after it crossed the star the star got real bright, then it moved!! to its left i followed it a little while then it went out of view.

it happened in san jacinto, calif.  

august 1st 2009 around 8 to 9 pm
content.summary: Star got bright then moved off to its left my right.
